description:
**Fix Overview**:

To remove the Copilot feature from Microsoft Edge using Group Policy and registry edits:

1. Open the Windows Registry Editor.
2. Navigate to the following path: `HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge`.
3. Create or modify the following DWORD values:
   - Set `hubssidebarenabled` to `0` to disable the Side Copilot icon.
   - Set `newtabpagebingchatenabled` to `0` to remove Bing Chat from the start page.
4. Alternatively, download the provided registry file and execute it to apply these settings automatically, confirming any system prompts.

**Details**:
- Ensure you have administrative privileges to make changes to the registry.
- Back up the registry before making any changes to prevent accidental misconfigurations.

For additional resources, you can refer to the following link: [Microsoft Edge Policies](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/deployedge/microsoft-edge-policies#newtabpagebingchatenabled).
